radiographic_examinations.findings: The right kidney measures 9.9 cm. The left kidney measures 10.2 cm. There is no mass, stone or hydronephrosis. The bladder is minimally to mildly distended but grossly unremarkable. Color Doppler shows normal arterial waveforms in the bilateral main renal arteries and normal venous flow within the kidneys. Resistive indices of the intraparenchymal arteries in the right kidney measure 0.68-0.71. The resistive indices in the left kidney range from 0.69 to 0.7.
